<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If a file descriptor being monitored by ::poll is closed by another thread,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the result is unspecified. In the case ::poll does not unblock and return,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// when ActiveFD is closed, you can provide another file descriptor via CancelFD</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that when written to will cause poll to return. Typically CancelFD is the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// read end of a unidirectional pipe.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Timeout should be -1 to block indefinitly</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// getActiveFD is a callback to handle ActiveFD&#39;s of std::atomic&lt;int&gt; and int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::error&#95;code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="#ab48a833c4f2a5ebcee2b8abada3e0ac5"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="#ab48a833c4f2a5ebcee2b8abada3e0ac5">manageTimeout</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::chrono::milliseconds &amp;Timeout,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::function&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">()&gt; &amp;getActiveFD,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::optional&lt;int&gt; &amp;CancelFD = std::nullopt) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">pollfd FD&#91;2&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  FD&#91;0&#93;.events = POLLIN;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifdef &#95;WIN32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  SOCKET WinServerSock = &#95;get&#95;osfhandle(getActiveFD());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  FD&#91;0&#93;.fd = WinServerSock;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  FD&#91;0&#93;.fd = getActiveFD();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t FDCount = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CancelFD.has&#95;value()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">    FD&#91;1&#93;.events = POLLIN;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    FD&#91;1&#93;.fd = CancelFD.value();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">    FDCount++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep track of how much time has passed in case ::poll or WSAPoll are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// interupted by a signal and need to be recalled</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Start = std::chrono::steady&#95;clock::now();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RemainingTimeout = Timeout;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PollStatus = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Timeout is -1 then poll should block and RemainingTimeout does not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// need to be recalculated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PollStatus != 0 &amp;&amp; Timeout != std::chrono::milliseconds(-1)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TotalElapsedTime =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">          std::chrono::duration&#95;cast&lt;std::chrono::milliseconds&gt;(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">              std::chrono::steady&#95;clock::now() - Start);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TotalElapsedTime &gt;= Timeout)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;error&#95;code(std::errc::operation&#95;would&#95;block);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">      RemainingTimeout = Timeout - TotalElapsedTime;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifdef &#95;WIN32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">    PollStatus = WSAPoll(FD, FDCount, RemainingTimeout.count());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PollStatus == SOCKET&#95;ERROR &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">           <a href="#a962923a59c6a9e8ab55ec73dc320f68f">getLastSocketErrorCode</a>() == std::errc::interrupted);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">    PollStatus = ::poll(FD, FDCount, RemainingTimeout.count());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PollStatus == -1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">           <a href="#a962923a59c6a9e8ab55ec73dc320f68f">getLastSocketErrorCode</a>() == std::errc::interrupted);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If ActiveFD equals -1 or CancelFD has data to be read then the operation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// has been canceled by another thread</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (getActiveFD() == -1 || (CancelFD.has&#95;value() &amp;&amp; FD&#91;1&#93;.revents &amp; POLLIN))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;error&#95;code(std::errc::operation&#95;canceled);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#if &#95;WIN32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PollStatus == SOCKET&#95;ERROR)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PollStatus == -1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
